title: Flow – PLAZA ORB / wearing skullboy jackets
description: This what happens when you put either of their jackets on, ya cool cad!

dialogueTree.title: Composure: "You've finally made it haven't you?..."
dialogueTree.text: You've finally made it haven't you? People point fingers at you and whisper to each other when you pass by, wondering to themselves:

links.title: Composure: ""Where did that man get such a cool..."
links.text: "Where did that man get such a cool jacket? Did he receive it upon graduating the École normale supérieure de Bad-Assery? Is he *dangerous?*"

links.title: Composure: "You are very dangerous, my friend...."
links.text: You are very dangerous, my friend. Dangerous and cool. In fact, no one dares to say *a single thing* about the jacket. But believe me, they are all *very impressed*.

links.title: You: "Yeah -- a danger to *myself*. What..."
links.text: Yeah -- a danger to *myself*. What am I doing? This is insane.

links.title: Composure: "Oh no, believe me -- it will be *ev..."
links.text: Oh no, believe me -- it will be *everyone else* who's uncomfortable with it. You're safe. No one dares say a word -- unless they're, like, from your station and coming to *judge* you. But what are the chances of that happening?
